timeline.bodyText:
nit: Does this need to be at the beginning?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                mvn -q --batch-mode --fail-at-end clean verify -P lint \
          
          
            
                mvn -P lint -q --batch-mode --fail-at-end clean verify \
timeline.author: kurtisvg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -166,7 +166,7 @@ for file in **/pom.xml; do
     fi
 
     # Use maven to execute the tests for the project.
-    mvn -q --batch-mode --fail-at-end clean verify \
+    mvn -q --batch-mode --fail-at-end clean verify -P lint \

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - [ ] Tests pass
          
          
            
            - [ ] shared-configuration 1.0.17
          
          
            
            - [ ] mvn -P lint clean verify
          
          
            
            - [ ] Tests pass (`mvn -P lint clean verify`)?
          
          
            
            - [ ] `pom.xml` parent set to latest `shared-configuration`
timeline.author: kurtisvg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,8 @@ Fixes #<issue_number_goes_here>
 > It's a good idea to open an issue first for discussion.
 
 - [ ] Tests pass
+- [ ] shared-configuration 1.0.17
+- [ ] mvn -P lint clean verify
